text: Chico is a city in the Central Valley of the American state of California. It is in the northern part of the state. Chico is in the Sacramento Valley close to the foothills of the Sierra Nevada mountain range. The city has a population of 101,475, as of 2020. People first started living in Chico in 1843. The city was founded in 1860 and started to govern itself in 1872. == Sister cities == * – Tamsui, Taipei, Taiwan 1985 * – Pascagoula, Mississippi (U.S.) 2005 == References == == Other websites == * *Downtown Chico Business Association *Chico Chamber of Commerce *City-data.com info on Chico Category:Cities in California Category:Cities in the Central Valley of California Category:1860 establishments in the United States Category:Settlements in Butte County, California Category:1860s establishments in California
title: Chico, California
